items.title: 2 Dividend Stocks to Buy Hand Over Fist in April
items.description: This stands to reason, as nearly every stage of drug development and marketing is resource- and capital-intensive, and as a result, cash can be in short supply.  Let's take a look at two outliers with dividend policies that have looked especially attractive lately -- pharmaceutical companies Amgen (NASDAQ: AMGN) and AbbVie (NYSE: ABBV).  Amgen's involvement in the high-demand obesity drugs race has attracted attention recently, but the pharmaceutical sector star has been on the radar of clever investors for years.
